6. Committed to sourcing the equivalent of 100% of our global electricity consumption from renewable sources by 2025. Renewables percentage is supported by the surrender of renewable energy attribute certificates (EACs) directly by, or on behalf of, Westpac for direct electricity consumption. This figure differs from the higher renewables percentage reported under Westpac's Climate Active Public Disclosure Statement due to the Climate Active Standard Electricity Accounting methodology recognising jurisdictional renewable energy targets and the large-scale renewable energy target.
